archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection includes papers by Young relating to education in Virginia, as well as an original poem.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Harold N. Young Papers must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Harold N. Young Papers, Ms1970-007, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Harold N. Young Papers were acquired prior to 1970.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Harold N. Young Papers was completed in 1970. Additional description was completed in April 2011.

bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: Harold N. Young was a agricultural economist. He was born in New York and educated at Cornell University (1913-1917). He was a sergeant in Intelligence Section, 38th Infantry, in World War I. He was principal of Union School in Constableville, New York (1919-1930). Then he became a professor of Agricultural Economics at Virginia Polytechnic Institute (1930-1965) and Director of the Virginia Agricultural Experiment Station (VAES). He was later Director Emeritus of VAES (1965-1978).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content note
scopecontent.p: The collection includes papers by Young on such topics as "Targets and Responsibilities [for the VAES]," "Liberty and Responsibility," "Needed--A New Water Law in Virginia," "Some Reflections on Public Education in Virginia," and "VPI, the General Education Board and Related Topics." Also includes a poem, ""Charge of the Night Brigade"" by Young.
